constantValues: Task performed, or to be performed, by a user for planning or running a campaign.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the campaign activity, such as key talking points, objectives, or details about the target audience.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the campaign activity, such as key talking points, objectives, or details about the target audience.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows whether the campaign activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled campaign activities are read-only and can't be edited.

members.description: Shows whether the campaign activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled campaign activities are read-only and can't be edited.

foreignKeyAttribute.explanation: Place holder that merges with the better attribute description from the ActivityCommon entity
foreignKeyAttribute.name: id
id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the case record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the case record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Last SLA that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.name: actualCost

constantValues: Type the actual cost of the campaign activity. The value entered is rolled up to the related campaign in the total cost calculations.

members.description: Type the actual cost of the campaign activity. The value entered is rolled up to the related campaign in the total cost calculations.

members.name: actualCostBase

constantValues: Value of the Actual Cost in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Actual Cost in base currency.

members.name: budgetedCost

constantValues: Type the allocated budget of the campaign activity for estimated versus actual cost reporting.

members.description: Type the allocated budget of the campaign activity for estimated versus actual cost reporting.

members.name: budgetedCostBase

constantValues: Value of the Budget Allocated in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Budget Allocated in base currency.

members.name: channelTypeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Select how communications for this activity will be sent, such as phone, letter, fax, or email.

members.description: Select how communications for this activity will be sent, such as phone, letter, fax, or email.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'channelTypeCode_display' is added to the 'CampaignActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'channelTypeCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: channelTypeCode_display

members.name: doNotSendOnOptOut

constantValues: Select whether to override the opt-out settings on leads, contacts, and accounts for the members of the target marketing lists of the campaign activity. If No is selected, marketing materials will be sent to members who have opted out.

members.description: Select whether to override the opt-out settings on leads, contacts, and accounts for the members of the target marketing lists of the campaign activity. If No is selected, marketing materials will be sent to members who have opted out.

members.name: excludeIfContactedInXDays

constantValues: Type the minimum number of days that must be passed before a marketing list member can be contacted in a campaign again. The campaign activity will not be applied to members contacted within the specified time period.

members.description: Type the minimum number of days that must be passed before a marketing list member can be contacted in a campaign again. The campaign activity will not be applied to members contacted within the specified time period.

members.name: ignoreInactiveListMembers

constantValues: Select whether inactive marketing list members will be excluded from the campaign activity distribution.

members.description: Select whether inactive marketing list members will be excluded from the campaign activity distribution.

members.name: typeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Select the type of campaign activity to indicate the purpose of the activity.

members.description: Select the type of campaign activity to indicate the purpose of the activity.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'typeCode_display' is added to the 'CampaignActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'typeCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: typeCode_display

members.name: serviceId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the associated service.

members.description: Unique identifier of the associated service.
